questions.question: The performance of the students ………………………….. excellent.
questions.description: Here the subject is the singular noun performance.

questions.question: More than 10,000 kilometers ………………………. India from Europe.
questions.description: When we talk about distance expressions like 10,000 kilometers are treated as singular.

questions.question: One of my sisters ……………………….. abroad.
questions.description: Here the subject is the singular expression one.

questions.question: Neither of them ……………………….. here.
questions.description: Use a singular verb after either and neither.

questions.question: Everybody ………………………. come.
questions.description: Use a singular verb after every, everybody, everyone etc.

questions.question: Each of the students …………………………. punished.
questions.description: Use a singular verb after each, every.

questions.question: One of the students ……………………….. missing.
questions.description: Use a singular verb after one of.

questions.question: The officer as well as the subordinates ………………………… present.
questions.description: When we connect two nouns with as well as, the verb agrees with the first.

questions.question: Many parents ………………………… present at the meeting.
She always ……………………….. fault with others.
questions.description: The subject is the singular pronoun she.

questions.question: The moon as well as the stars ………………………. us light.
